product_overview: SkillVault is an AI-ready, skill-first assessment and certification platform designed for verified colleges to assess, certify, and showcase student skills in a trusted and recruiter-verifiable manner, shifting the focus from traditional marks-based evaluation to demonstrable skill-based credentials.
core_goals: Enable skill-based assessments that better reflect real-world competencies.
Ensure trust and authenticity through college verification and certificate validation.
Provide recruiters with reliable access to verified skill data without academic marks bias.
Prevent cheating and enforce exam integrity with lightweight proctoring techniques.
Engage students with gamification features like daily quizzes and streak tracking.
key_features: Multi-role authentication system with role-based access for students, faculty, college admins, recruiters, and super admins.
Comprehensive dashboards tailored to each role for managing assessments, students, certificates, and analytics.
Skill assessment system supporting MCQs, coding challenges, practical tasks, and multiple difficulty levels.
Daily quiz and streak system fostering continuous learning and engagement.
AI-powered question generation using OpenAI API to streamline assessment creation.
Certificate generation and verification system with QR code embedding and trusted college-issued certificates.
Recruiter portal for skill-based student search, certificate verification, and candidate shortlisting without academic marks exposure.
Skill gap analysis and personalized recommendations for student skill development.
Resume PDF generation including verified skills and certificates for student career readiness.
Robust anti-cheating measures including fullscreen enforcement, tab switch detection, and disabling copy-paste during assessments.
Dynamic certificate template management allowing customization by course, department, and issuer.
user_flow_summary: User registration under verified colleges with role-based login and access control.
College admin manages faculty and student onboarding along with issuing certificates post verification.
Faculty creates, edits, and manages assessments and question banks, and views student performance analytics.
Students take skill assessments, participate in daily quizzes maintaining streaks, track skill progress and download certificates.
Recruiters search and filter students by verified skills and certificate status, verifying them securely through QR codes.
Super admins oversee platform-wide management including user roles, certified colleges, templates, reports, and global analytics.
validation_criteria: All user roles must have secure, role-based access with proper authorization.
Assessments support full CRUD operations and integrate AI-generated questions where applicable.
Certificates generated must include QR codes and be verifiable through a dedicated portal.
Daily quizzes must track participation and reset streaks accurately with visual feedback.
Anti-cheating measures must prevent copying, tab switching, and enforce fullscreen during assessments.
Recruiter searches return only verified skill data without exposing academic marks or CGPA.
Skill gap analysis recommendations align with assessment performance data.
Resume generation outputs accurate PDF documents reflecting verified skills and certificates.
Platform scales to support multiple verified colleges and maintains data integrity across modules.
College verification flow must enforce registration restrictions and verified badge display consistently.
